mapper.select: /* MiscellaneousMapper.xml, getUaCode, SAC : 김다슬 , 2014-01-09 */ SELECT UA_CD FROM TB_CM_DEVICE WHERE DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelNo}
mapper.insert: /* MiscellaneousMapper.xml, insertPhoneAuthCode, SAC : 김다슬 , 2014-01-16 */ INSERT INTO TB_CM_SVC_AUTH( AUTH_SEQ, TENANT_ID, AUTH_TYPE_CD, /* 인증 타입 (CM010901:SMS, CM010902:Email) */ AUTH_SIGN, /* 인증 Signature */ AUTH_VALUE, /* 인증 코드 */ AUTH_VALUE_CREATE_DT, /* 인증 코드 생성 일자 */ AUTH_COMPT_YN, /* 인증 여부 - 초기화 */ REG_ID, REG_DT, UPD_ID, UPD_DT ) VALUES( #{auth_seq}, #{tenant_id}, #{authTypeCd}, #{auth_sign}, #{auth_value}, SYSDATE, 'N', 'admin', SYSDATE, 'admin', SYSDATE )
mapper.update: /* MiscellaneousMapper.xml, updatePhoneAuthYn, SAC : 김다슬 , 2014-01-16 */ UPDATE TB_CM_SVC_AUTH SET AUTH_COMPT_YN = 'Y', UPD_ID = 'admin', UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE AUTH_SEQ = #{authSeq}
